publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6274 Sarah Boyack: Innis and Gunn Brew up Success—That the Parliament congratulates the Edinburgh-based brewer, Innis and Gunn, on its recent success at the Scotland Food and Drink Excellence Awards; notes that the company won four awards, including the prestigious Business of the Year award, International Business of the Year, Drink - Alcoholic and Non - Alcoholic category and Product Innovation category for its oak-aged beers; further notes that the family-run brewery recently received a Queen’s Award for Enterprise for international trade and also collected two gold medals at the 2010 Monde Selection Quality Awards in Brussels; believes that this is an excellent example of the quality of products that Scotland has to offer, and recognises the outstanding performance in enterprise that this local company has shown.
S3M-6274 Innis and Gunn Brew up Success (lodged on 10 May 2010) Rhona Brankin*, Mary Mulligan*, Jackie Baillie*, David Stewart*, David Whitton*, Rob Gibson*
S3M-6274 Innis and Gunn Brew up Success (lodged on 10 May 2010) Cathy Jamieson*, Stuart McMillan*, Robin Harper*
